title: WTB:N172 Old Judge Mike Kelly batting
author: spankdog

posts.post_title: WTB:N172 Old Judge Mike Kelly batting
posts.post_content: Howdy, I'm looking to pickup an old judge mike kelly batting. looking for a graded one, I'd like a 4-5, but will take lower, psa or sgc. thanks!!
super bump:) Anybody have one for me, I will pay in real money, please!
